participant_1.background: my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i dye my hair every three months. i've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood.

participant_2.background: i work for our local supermarket. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i've a cat named spook. i've never been out of ohio.

content.text: hello, how are you? what do you do for a living? I am a veterinarian
what are you up to? I just got back from playing roleplaying. I love it
